entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:28 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the morning. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:28 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:28 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
